parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It focuses on a public health issue (West Nile virus) and its relation to climate change.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content addresses a public health concern affecting a large population in Romania.  The use of hashtags further suggests an intention to reach a wide audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is to raise awareness about the West Nile virus outbreak in Romania and its connection to climate change. While the post mentions the impact on public health, it does not advocate for or against any particular candidate or party in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information on a public health issue, citing an expert (Dr. Adrian Pană) and statistics.  The style and content align with journalistic reporting, aiming to inform the public rather than influence votes.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express personal opinions unrelated to the factual information presented about the West Nile virus outbreak.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>873690674582442</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, focusing on the West Nile virus outbreak in Romania and its connection to climate change, does not constitute electoral propaganda.  The content is primarily informative, presenting factual data and expert opinions on a public health issue.  There is no mention of any parliamentary candidates or parties, nor any attempt to influence voters' choices in the election. The post's objective is clearly to raise public awareness about a significant health concern.  While the post is a paid advertisement, its content and purpose do not align with the definition of electoral propaganda as outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Videomedicina.ro</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
